text: Night Stalker is an unusual funny car.Taylor, Thom. "Kent Fuller Sidewinder III", in "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone", p. 42. Built by Jack Chrisman in 1971, the Mustang was a "sidewinder"—that is, the engine was mounted transversely in the chassis. Night Stalker was the first funny car John Force ever drove. ==Notes== ==Sources== * Taylor, Thom. "Beauty Beyond the Twilight Zone" in Hot Rod, April 2017, pp. 30–43.
